channel.title: Image Cache Error. (I think its a PI base)
channel.description:
I have no clue what to do. I am just trying to JAR a client for the server I am hosting. Once I compress the cache, I open it and make sure my background screen is in. After that, I place it in dropbox and then download the cache, BUT once I do my created image is gone and the old one reappears.
Please don't post "change it in the cache file" Tried it.
I just want to know if it is stored somewhere to automatically place that specific background image on the client and override mine.
Also, I did change the dropbox download link in the files and it downloads it correctly, buy it just replaces everything of mine with the originals.

item.title: Image Cache Error. (I think its a PI base)

item.description:
@dougie wrote:

I have no clue what to do. I am just trying to JAR a client for the server I am hosting. Once I compress the cache, I open it and make sure my background screen is in. After that, I place it in dropbox and then download the cache, BUT once I do my created image is gone and the old one reappears.

Please don’t post “change it in the cache file” Tried it.

I just want to know if it is stored somewhere to automatically place that specific background image on the client and override mine.

Also, I did change the dropbox download link in the files and it downloads it correctly, buy it just replaces everything of mine with the originals.
